CustomField.description: Indicates that the Operative who submitted the On Site Agreement form started the work at that moment and therefore there is no need for any office staff to create a Service Appointment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the Operative who submitted the On Site Agreement form started the work at that moment and therefore there is no need for any office staff to create a Service Appointment.
CustomField.label: Work Commenced Immediately
